statements: SELECT * FROM MarketingMessages ORDER BY message_content DESC
SELECT message_id, location_name FROM MarketingMessages WHERE location_id=1
SELECT message_content FROM MarketingMessages WHERE location_name='New York'
SELECT * FROM MarketingMessages WHERE message_id=3
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM MarketingMessages
SELECT message_id, message_content FROM MarketingMessages WHERE location_id = 1 ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MarketingMessages WHERE message_content LIKE '%promotion%' AND location_name = 'New York';
SELECT message_content, location_name FROM MarketingMessages GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY message_id ASC;
SELECT location_id, COUNT(message_id) AS num_messages FROM MarketingMessages WHERE location_id IN (2, 3) GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM MarketingMessages ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT message_text, target_location FROM marketing_messages;
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customers WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE location LIKE 'Los%';
SELECT * FROM customers c JOIN marketing_messages m ON c.location = m.target_location;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customers ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geo_targets;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geo_targets;
SELECT id, location_name FROM geo_targets ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM marketing_messages WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geo_targets WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -90.0;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geo_targets WHERE location_name LIKE 'New%';
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM marketing_messages WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM location_based_marketing JOIN geo_targets ON location_based_marketing.id = geo_targets.id WHERE message_id = 5;

SELECT message_text, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_messages JOIN location_based_marketing ON marketing_messages.message_id = location_based_marketing.message_id WHERE location_based_marketing.id = 10;
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT city, state FROM location WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM marketing_messages ORDER BY target_country DESC, target_state ASC;
SELECT message_id, delivery_date, opens FROM message_stats WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE city='New York' AND state='NY';
SELECT * FROM location WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT message_text, opens FROM marketing_messages WHERE target_city = 'New York' ORDER BY opens DESC;
SELECT delivery_date, opens, clicks FROM message_stats WHERE delivery_date >= '2021-01-01' AND delivery_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT message_id, name, email, city, state, country FROM user_profiles WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'California';
SELECT city, state, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM user_profiles GROUP BY city, state ORDER BY total_users DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email, city FROM customers WHERE state='California';
SELECT customer_id, name FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE targeting_location='USA';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, name, city FROM customers ORDER BY city ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY budget DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, cr.revenue, c.targeting_location, l.country FROM marketing_campaigns c JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id JOIN location_data l ON c.targeting_location = l.city WHERE cr.revenue > 10000;
